action.text: Amendment SA 1030 under the order of 7/26/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 11 - 88. Record Vote Number: 203.
Amendment SA 1030 proposed by Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 935. (consideration: CR S3718-3719) To reduce military spending.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1030 proposed by Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 935.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1030 under the order of 7/26/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 11 - 88. Record Vote Number: 203.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1030 under the order of 7/26/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 11 - 88. Record Vote Number: 203.
